channel.title: CVE Feed for OMRON Corporation -- CX-Programmer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OMRON Corporation -- CX-Programmer

item.title: CVE-2023-38747|2024-10-21T19:34:50.342Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer Included in CX-One CXONE-AL[][]D-V4 V9.80 and earlier. By having a user open a specially crafted CXP file, information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution may occur.

item.title: CVE-2024-31412|2024-08-02T01:52:56.842Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer included in CX-One CXONE-AL[][]D-V4 Ver. 9.81 or lower. Opening a specially crafted project file may lead to information disclosure and/or the product being crashed.

item.title: CVE-2024-31412|2024-05-01T12:52:13.173Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer included in CX-One CXONE-AL[][]D-V4 Ver. 9.81 or lower. Opening a specially crafted project file may lead to information disclosure and/or the product being crashed.
